Pawnmorph.Hediffs.MutationDef.label: digitigrade
Pawnmorph.Hediffs.MutationDef.description: The shape of [PAWN_nameDef]'s legs reminds one more of a beast than a human, for they now stand on their toes instead of their heel, which has elongated. This does, however, put a spring in their step.

li.description: [PAWN_nameDef]'s leg seems to have degraded into something that looks awfully uncomfortable to walk on.
The bones in [PAWN_nameDef]'s leg are growing longer or shorter as need be. It will be rather difficult and painful to move while this change is taking place.

Pawnmorph.Hediffs.MutationDef.label: paw
Pawnmorph.Hediffs.MutationDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef]'s feet have stretched out, growing a coat of fur, the toes shortening to clawed digits.

li.description: [PAWN_nameDef]'s nails have lengthened and turned darker, now blunt claws.
Pads have begun to develop on the ball and toes of [PAWN_nameDef]'s foot, making it slightly easier to move over rough terrain.
This foot more closely resembles a paw, but still retains some humanlike features to aid stability.

Pawnmorph.Hediffs.MutationDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef]'s toenails have thickened and grown into a veritable hoof, with a split down the middle.
